alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 2:10PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Walton, southern Holmes and northern Washington Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 110 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bonifay, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph, pea size hail, and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Bonifay, Chipley, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Westville, Hinsons Crossroads, Brock Crossroad, Holmes County Airport, Whitehead Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Gritney, Five Points, Hulaw, Hickory Hill, Poplar Head and Johnson Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
